attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are we paying billions of pounds worth of bonuses to bank execs and not using the money to save one of Britains only remaining steel works? In Teesside alone 1700 people will lose their jobs , is this really what you want this country to be remembered for?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
